game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity has been wiped out by an unknown catastrophic event.
game.ending: The last remnants of humanity have found hope in a hidden underground bunker where the player must find a way to restore the planet's ecosystem.
game.synopsis: Echoes of Eternity is a narrative-driven RPG set in a dystopian future where the player must navigate the ruins of civilization, uncovering clues and piecing together the events leading up to the apocalypse. Along the way, they'll encounter other survivors, form alliances, and make choices that impact the fate of humanity's last hope.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
